intro: Psychotria cenepensis, commonly known as the "Cepen" or "Yare" in some indigenous languages, is a tropical shrub native to the rainforests of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. It is often found in humid, shaded environments and plays a role in the ecological dynamics of its habitat. Psychotria cenepensis is also known for its use in traditional medicine by local communities.
